Title: Mahou no Ryouri: Kimi kara Kimi e
Description: ['An inspirational song about it is difficult to dream when being scolded but encourages kids to allow themselves to feel these emotions because it is vital in growing up.']
Related: ['Prequel: Malta no Bouken Season 2', 'Alternative version: Malta no Kamishibai', 'Other: Malta no Utaou']
